short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plot your adventures through the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to upload screenshots to your feed on https://browses.io and start putting your browsing history to some use. Help others who are on the same adventure as you by visually sharing the sites you found useful. Clicking on the extension authenticates you with facebook, captures a screenshot of the active tab and uploads the browse to your feed.
